metroflex_events.overview: MetroFlex hosts three premier NPC Championship events: Better Bodies Classic (rebranded as Texas Legends Championship), Ronnie Coleman Classic 30th Anniversary, and Branch Warren Classic Houston. All events use MuscleWare registration platform.
metroflex_events.scope: THIS KNOWLEDGE BASE IS FOR METROFLEX EVENTS ONLY - metroflexevents.com. Does NOT include gym memberships or licensing.

events.name: Texas Legends Championship
events.location: The Original MetroFlex Gym, Arlington, TX
events.description: Experience the raw intensity of powerlifting combined with MetroFlex's legendary Wild Game Feast. Witness elite strength athletes compete in the atmosphere that forged champions for over 38 years.

events.name: NPC Ronnie Coleman Classic
events.location: Fort Worth Convention Center, Fort Worth, TX
events.description: Celebrating 30 years of the Ronnie Coleman Classic. Championship NPC bodybuilding event honoring 8x Mr. Olympia Ronnie Coleman. One of Texas' premier national qualifier events.

events.name: NPC Branch Warren Classic Houston
events.description: Texas' flagship Branch Warren Classic. Championship NPC bodybuilding event honoring 2x Arnold Classic Champion Branch Warren. National qualifier status.
special_features: Honoring 2x Arnold Classic Champion Branch Warren

competitor_registration.overview: MuscleWare is the official contest software and registration platform for NPC, NPC Worldwide, IFBB Professional League, and Canadian Physique Alliance.
competitor_registration.key_principle: Athletes DO NOT register directly on MuscleWare.com. Instead, each event promoter has a dedicated event website where registration occurs. MuscleWare powers the backend.

registration_process.action: Find your contest at npcnewsonline.com contest calendar
Complete personal information (name, DOB, email, phone, country)
Enter valid NPC Member Number (must be non-zero)
Select division(s) and class(es) - up to 8 divisions per registration
Accept Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy
Proceed to Confirmation and review information
Complete payment through promoter's payment gateway
Receive confirmation email with athlete profile link

npc_membership.requirement: You must have a valid NPC Member Number to register for any NPC competition
npc_membership.how_to_get: Visit npcnewsonline.com to purchase NPC membership
npc_membership.validation: Number must be non-zero and validated at form submission

pricing_tiers.description: Earliest registration period with lowest pricing
pricing_tiers.typical_pricing: $75-100 per division (Texas Legends, Ronnie Coleman, Branch Warren)

pricing_tiers.description: Close to event date, higher fees
Registration on competition day, highest fees if available

spectator_ticketing.overview: All MetroFlex Events use TicketSpice for spectator ticket sales. Competitor registration is separate through MuscleWare.

ticket_types.description: Standard entry to watch the competition
Access to both prejudging and finals (when applicable)
4 general admission tickets at discounted rate

booking_process.action: Complete payment via TicketSpice secure checkout
Receive e-ticket via email with QR code
Present QR code at event entrance

spectator_ticketing.refund_policy: Tickets are non-refundable but transferable. Contact brian@metroflexgym.com for transfer requests up to 48 hours before event.
spectator_ticketing.group_bookings: Groups of 10+ spectators qualify for 15% discount. Contact brian@metroflexgym.com for group booking codes.
important_notes: Spectator tickets are separate from competitor registration
Competitors receive 2 complimentary spectator passes for family/friends
Children 12 and under free with paid adult admission
Doors open 1 hour before prejudging starts

vendor_booths.overview: MetroFlex Events offers vendor booth opportunities at all three NPC championships. Ideal for supplement companies, apparel brands, nutrition services, and fitness equipment providers.

booth_packages.ideal_for: Small businesses, local brands, service providers

includes: Logo on event website and program
Title sponsorship branding on all materials
Logo on website, program, banners, and stage backdrop
Speaking opportunity (5-minute product demo on stage)
Exclusive product sampling in competitor goodie bags
booth_packages.ideal_for: Major brands seeking title sponsorship, national supplement companies

booking_process.action: Email brian@metroflexgym.com with subject: 'Vendor Booth Inquiry - [Event Name]'
Receive vendor application form and booth map
Select preferred booth location and package
Submit completed application with company logo and marketing materials
Pay remaining balance 14 days before event
Receive final vendor packet with setup instructions

restrictions: No open flame or cooking equipment
No pyramid schemes or MLM hard-sell tactics

multi_event_discounts.annual_package: $3,500 for Standard Booth at all 3 events (save $1,000)

sponsorship_opportunities.overview: MetroFlex Events offers tiered sponsorship packages providing brand exposure to 500-2,000 fitness enthusiasts, competitors, and industry professionals per event.

benefits: Logo on all marketing materials (digital + print)
Logo on stage backdrop and banners
Social media promotion (20+ posts across all channels)
Attendee email list with opt-in for partner communications
Product sampling in all competitor goodie bags
Logo on event website and all digital materials
Product sampling in competitor goodie bags
Exclusive sponsorship of specific division (e.g., 'Men's Physique presented by [Brand]')
Logo on event website and program
Trophy presentation opportunity for your division
Product sampling in your division's goodie bags

sponsorship_opportunities.custom_packages: Custom sponsorship packages available for brands seeking unique activation opportunities. Contact brian@metroflexgym.com to discuss.

annual_sponsorship.benefits: Title Sponsor benefits across all 3 MetroFlex Events championships (save $10,000)
additional_perks: First right of refusal for 2027 season

divisions_and_classes.overview: NPC competitions feature 10 major divisions with specific class structures based on weight, height, age, or experience level.

Mens_Bodybuilding.description: Traditional bodybuilding division focusing on maximum muscle mass, symmetry, and conditioning

special_categories: Heroes (military, police, firefighters, emergency services, medical professionals)

Mens_Classic_Physique.description: Classic bodybuilding aesthetic emphasizing symmetry, proportions, and classic poses

open_height_weight_classes: Class A: Various height categories from 5'4" and under up to 5'7"
Class B: Height categories from over 5'7" up to 5'10"
Class C: Height categories over 5'10" up to 6'7" and above
class_types.note: Classic Physique uses height-to-weight ratio formula with maximum allowable weight per height

Mens_Physique.description: Board shorts division emphasizing V-taper, conditioning, and stage presence

Womens_Fitness.description: Combines physique round with fitness routine featuring gymnastics/acrobatic elements

Womens_Bodybuilding.description: Traditional women's bodybuilding emphasizing muscle mass and conditioning

Figure.description: Athletic physique with muscle tone, symmetry, and femininity

Bikini.description: Emphasizes overall physical appearance, stage presence, and confidence

Womens_Physique.description: Muscular development with femininity, symmetry, and muscle separation

Wellness.description: Balance between upper body tone and lower body muscle development

Fit_Model.description: Commercial fitness model look with specific proportions
Fit_Model.special_restriction: Women's Fit Model competitors CANNOT cross over to other divisions

crossover_rules.duplicate_class_prevention: Enforced - cannot register for same class twice
crossover_rules.fit_model_restriction: Women's Fit Model competitors cannot cross over to other divisions

music_requirements.upload_location: Athlete Profile page (link provided in confirmation email)
music_requirements.when_to_upload: After registration confirmation, typically required 48-72 hours before event
music_requirements.important_note: Music requirements vary by division. Fitness routines require music, posing routines optional.

common_questions.question: Do I need an NPC membership to compete?
common_questions.answer: Yes, you must have a valid NPC Member Number to register for any NPC competition. Visit npcnewsonline.com to purchase membership if you don't have one.

common_questions.question: Can I compete in multiple divisions?
common_questions.answer: Yes, you can compete in up to 8 divisions per registration. However, Women's Fit Model competitors cannot cross over to other divisions.

common_questions.question: How do I buy spectator tickets?
common_questions.answer: Spectator tickets are available through TicketSpice. Visit the event-specific URL (e.g., ticketspice.com/metroflex-ronnie-coleman-2026). Competitor registration is separate through MuscleWare. Competitors receive 2 complimentary spectator passes.

common_questions.question: How can I become a vendor at MetroFlex Events?
common_questions.answer: Email brian@metroflexgym.com with 'Vendor Booth Inquiry' in the subject line. We offer Standard ($500), Premium ($1,200), and Title Sponsor ($3,500) booth packages. Multi-event discounts available.

common_questions.question: What's the difference between Novice and True Novice?
common_questions.answer: True Novice means you have never competed before in any division. Novice means you haven't won an overall or class in that specific division.

common_questions.question: When should I upload my posing music?
common_questions.answer: Upload music to your Athlete Profile page (link in confirmation email) typically 48-72 hours before the event. MP3 format only.

common_questions.question: What if I need to change my class after registration?
common_questions.answer: Contact the event promoter directly through the contact information provided in your confirmation email.

common_questions.question: How does Classic Physique weight limits work?
common_questions.answer: Classic Physique uses a height-to-weight ratio formula. Your maximum allowable weight is determined by your height. Check the official NPC rules for specific weight caps per height.

common_questions.question: What payment methods are accepted for competitor registration?
common_questions.answer: Payment methods vary by promoter and typically include PayPal, Stripe, Square, Razorpay, Yoco, or FirstData. Funds flow directly to the event promoter.

common_questions.question: Will I receive a confirmation?
common_questions.answer: Yes, you'll receive a professional confirmation email containing registration details, your Athlete Profile link, music upload instructions, and event-specific information.

common_questions.question: Can I register on the day of the show?
common_questions.answer: Some events allow day-of-show registration at the highest pricing tier, but availability varies by promoter. Early registration is strongly recommended.

common_questions.question: Do you offer sponsorship opportunities?
common_questions.answer: Yes! We offer Title Sponsor ($10,000), Platinum ($5,000), Gold ($2,500), and Category Sponsor ($1,500) packages. Annual sponsorship across all 3 events is $20,000 (save $10,000). Contact brian@metroflexgym.com for custom packages.

troubleshooting.solution: Ensure both email fields match exactly, including capitalization. Check for extra spaces.
NPC Member Number must be non-zero. If you don't have one, visit npcnewsonline.com to purchase membership first.
You can select up to 8 divisions. Each division requires a corresponding class selection. Ensure you're not trying to register for the same class twice.
Ensure file is MP3 format only. Check file size isn't too large. Use your Athlete Profile link from confirmation email to upload.
Payment processing uses the promoter's selected gateway. Contact the event promoter directly if payment issues occur.
Check spam folder. Wait 15-30 minutes. Contact event promoter if still not received.

troubleshooting.issue: TicketSpice spectator tickets not showing up
troubleshooting.solution: Check spam/junk folder for e-ticket email with QR code. Allow up to 30 minutes after purchase. Contact TicketSpice support if not received.
Email brian@metroflexgym.com with subject 'Vendor Booth Inquiry - [Event Name]'. Response time is typically 24-48 hours. Check spam folder.

metroflex_contact.address: The Original MetroFlex Gym, Arlington, TX
metroflex_contact.scope_note: For gym memberships or licensing inquiries, those are handled by a separate system. This knowledge base is for EVENTS ONLY.

competitor_registration: how much does it cost to compete

ai_ml_integration_notes.note: This RAG is for MetroFlex EVENTS ONLY. ML models for lead scoring, event attendance prediction, and sponsor qualification are specific to event operations.
lead_scoring_model_inputs: engagement_score (number of questions asked, time spent)
budget_indicators (asks about pricing, early bird, VIP, title sponsor)
authority_level (asks about group bookings, custom packages)
event_attendance_prediction_inputs: sponsorship_level (title sponsor events have higher attendance)
social_media_engagement (likes, shares, comments on event posts)
ai_ml_integration_notes.cross_referencing_protocol: If user asks about gym memberships, licensing, or apparel - DO NOT answer from this knowledge base. Politely refer to appropriate contact or state 'That's handled by our gym operations team at brian@metroflexgym.com'. ML may adapt to cross-reference ONLY if explicitly needed for event context (e.g., competitor asks about gym membership for training purposes before competing).
